title: How much I possibly earn money from write the blogs for affiliate products? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can earn a lot money depends on the product review you are writing about. If someone tell you this is particular the amount you earn is lie. No one have the best method of making exactly amount when it come to affiliate product, only the exact commission was promise you will again. If you enjoy writing start now but always try all the best you can to give useful insight to help reader. Good luck

It is up to you how much traffic you are able to generate on your blogs.But according to my experience in every 1000 people one person may click your link and might buy your product. So lets say you have 10 blogs of different products and traffic on your website is 2000 page views per day and your commission from one product is 100 rs then your daily earning will be of 2000 rs and monthly will be 60,000.
